prepares.PageData: SELECT ID as name, NAME as title, LEVEL, DESCRIPTION as overview, MATURITY_LEVEL as maturity, FUNCTION as functionality, PARENT as parent, TYPE as category, DOMAIN as domain FROM {{{table}}} WHERE ID=$id
prepares.ChildData: SELECT ID as name, NAME as title, DOMAIN as domain FROM {{{table}}} WHERE PARENT=$id
prepares.RelationChildData: SELECT {{{totable}}}.ID as name, NAME as title, MAP.SOURCE as source, MAP.MATURITY_LEVEL as maturity_level, MAP.MEMO as memo FROM (SELECT TO_KEY as ID, SOURCE, MATURITY_LEVEL, MEMO FROM MAPPING WHERE TO_TABLE == $totable AND FROM_KEY IN ({{{ids}}}) AND FROM_TABLE == $fromtable UNION SELECT FROM_KEY as ID, SOURCE, MATURITY_LEVEL, MEMO FROM MAPPING WHERE FROM_TABLE == $totable AND TO_KEY IN ({{{ids}}}) AND TO_TABLE == $fromtable) as MAP INNER JOIN {{{totable}}} ON {{{totable}}}.ID == MAP.ID

prepares.test: select sql from sqlite_master where type='table';
prepares.PageData: SELECT ID as name, NAME as title, LEVEL, DESCRIPTION as overview, MATURITY_LEVEL as maturity, FUNCTION as functionality, PARENT as parent, TYPE as category, DOMAIN as domain FROM {{{table}}} WHERE ID=$id
prepares.ChildData: SELECT ID as name, NAME as title, DOMAIN as domain FROM {{{table}}} WHERE PARENT=$id
prepares.RelationChildData: SELECT {{{totable}}}.ID as name, NAME as title, MAP.SOURCE as source, MAP.MATURITY_LEVEL as maturity_level, MAP.MEMO as memo FROM (SELECT TO_KEY as ID, SOURCE, MATURITY_LEVEL, MEMO FROM MAPPING WHERE TO_TABLE == $totable AND FROM_KEY IN ({{{ids}}}) AND FROM_TABLE == $fromtable UNION SELECT FROM_KEY as ID, SOURCE, MATURITY_LEVEL, MEMO FROM MAPPING WHERE FROM_TABLE == $totable AND TO_KEY IN ({{{ids}}}) AND TO_TABLE == $fromtable) as MAP INNER JOIN {{{totable}}} ON {{{totable}}}.ID == MAP.ID
